steps.name: mergeinputbams
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/MergeSamFiles.jar TMP_DIR=/working_dir INPUT=NA12878.bwa.bam USE_THREADING=true CREATE_INDEX=true OUTPUT=NA12878.bwa.sorted.bam

steps.name: markduplicates
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/MarkDuplicates.jar TMP_DIR=/working_dir I=chr22.bam O=chr22.nodup.bam M=chr22.bam.metrics VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT ASSUME_SORTED=true REMOVE_DUPLICATES=false

steps.name: findtargets
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T RealignerTargetCreator -I chr22.nodup.bam -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -o chr22.realn.intervals -L chr22 -known Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.hg19.vcf -known 1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -et NO_ET -K stanford.edu.key -nt 4

steps.name: realign
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -Djava.io.tmpdir=/working_dir -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T IndelRealigner -I chr22.nodup.bam -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -o chr22.realn.bam -L chr22 -targetIntervals chr22.realn.intervals -known Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.hg19.vcf -known 1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -et NO_ET -K stanford.edu.key

steps.name: fixmatepairs
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/FixMateInformation.jar TMP_DIR=/working_dir INPUT=chr22.realn.bam OUTPUT=chr22.realn.fixed.bam VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT SORT_ORDER=coordinate

steps.name: bqsr
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T BaseRecalibrator -I chr22.realn.fixed.bam -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -o chr22.recal.grp -knownSites Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.hg19.vcf -knownSites 1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -knownSites dbsnp_138.hg19.vcf -K stanford.edu.key -nct 4

steps.name: printreads
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -I chr22.realn.fixed.bam -o chr22.recal.bam -T PrintReads -BQSR chr22.recal.grp -K stanford.edu.key -nct 4

steps.name: haplotypecaller
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -Djava.io.tmpdir=/working_dir -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T HaplotypeCaller -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -I chr22.recal.bam --dbsnp dbsnp_138.hg19.vcf -o chr22.gatk.vcf.hc.vcf -stand_call_conf 20.0 -stand_emit_conf 10.0 --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY -nct 4

steps.name: selectsnps
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T SelectVariants -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -V chr22.gatk.vcf.hc.vcf -o chr22.gatk.vcf.snp -selectType SNP

steps.name: selectindels
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T SelectVariants -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -V chr22.gatk.vcf.hc.vcf -o chr22.gatk.vcf.indel -selectType INDEL

steps.name: combinesnpsindels
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -T CombineVariants --variant chr22.gatk.vcf.snp --variant chr22.gatk.vcf.indel -o chr22.gatk.vcf

steps.name: mergechromosomebams
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/MergeSamFiles.jar TMP_DIR=/working_dir INPUT=chr22.recal.bam USE_THREADING=true CREATE_INDEX=true OUTPUT=genome.recal.bam
